verses.verse: For this <S%G3778><s%> reason <S%G5484><s%> I, Paul, <S%G3972><s%> the prisoner <S%G1198><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> for the sake <S%G5228><s%> of you Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> â€“
if <S%G1487><s%> indeed <S%G1065><s%> you have heard <S%G191><s%> of the stewardship <S%G3622><s%> of God's grace <S%G5485><s%> which was given <S%G1325><s%> to me for you;
that by revelation <S%G602><s%> there was made <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> to me the mystery, <S%G3466><s%> as I wrote <S%G4270><s%> before <S%G4270><s%> in brief. <S%G3641><s%>
And by referring to this, <S%G3739><s%> when you read <S%G314><s%> you can <S%G1410><s%> understand <S%G3539><s%> my insight <S%G4907><s%> into the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

which <S%G3739><s%> in other <S%G2087><s%> generations <S%G1074><s%> was not made <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> to the sons <S%G5207><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> as it has now <S%G3568><s%> been revealed <S%G601><s%> to His holy <S%G40><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> and prophets <S%G4396><s%> in the Spirit; <S%G4151><s%>

[to be specific], that the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> are fellow <S%G4789><s%> heirs <S%G4789><s%> and fellow <S%G4954><s%> members <S%G4954><s%> of the body, <S%G4954><s%> and fellow <S%G4830><s%> partakers <S%G4830><s%> of the promise <S%G1860><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the gospel, <S%G2098><s%>

of which <S%G3739><s%> I was made <S%G1096><s%> a minister, <S%G1249><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the gift <S%G1431><s%> of God's grace <S%G5485><s%> which was given <S%G1325><s%> to me according <S%G2596><s%> to the working <S%G1753><s%> of His power. <S%G1411><s%>

To me, the very <S%G1646><s%> least <S%G1646><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> saints, <S%G40><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> was given, <S%G1325><s%> to preach <S%G2097><s%> to the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> the unfathomable <S%G421><s%> riches <S%G4149><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

and to bring <S%G5461><s%> to light <S%G5461><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is the administration <S%G3622><s%> of the mystery <S%G3466><s%> which for ages <S%G165><s%> has been hidden <S%G613><s%> in God, <S%G2316><s%> who created <S%G2936><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things; <S%G3956><s%>

in order <S%G2443><s%> that the manifold <S%G4182><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> might now <S%G3568><s%> be made <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%> to the rulers <S%G746><s%> and the authorities <S%G1849><s%> in the heavenly <S%G2032><s%> [places.]

[This was] in accordance <S%G2596><s%> with the eternal <S%G165><s%> purpose <S%G4286><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> He carried <S%G4160><s%> out in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> our Lord, <S%G2962><s%>
in whom <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> boldness <S%G3954><s%> and confident <S%G4006><s%> access <S%G4318><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in Him.
Therefore <S%G1352><s%> I ask <S%G154><s%> you not to lose <S%G7051><s%> heart <S%G7051><s%> at my tribulations <S%G2347><s%> on your behalf, <S%G5228><s%> for they are your glory. <S%G1391><s%>
For this <S%G3778><s%> reason, <S%G5484><s%> I bow <S%G2578><s%> my knees <S%G1119><s%> before <S%G4314><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%>
from whom <S%G3739><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> family <S%G3965><s%> in heaven <S%G3772><s%> and on earth <S%G1093><s%> derives <S%G3687><s%> its name, <S%G3687><s%>

that He would grant <S%G1325><s%> you, according <S%G2596><s%> to the riches <S%G4149><s%> of His glory, <S%G1391><s%> to be strengthened <S%G2901><s%> with power <S%G1411><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> His Spirit <S%G4151><s%> in the inner <S%G2080><s%> man; <S%G444><s%>

so that Christ <S%G5547><s%> may dwell <S%G2730><s%> in your hearts <S%G2588><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith; <S%G4102><s%> [and] that you, being rooted <S%G4492><s%> and grounded <S%G2311><s%> in love, <S%G26><s%>

may be able <S%G1840><s%> to comprehend <S%G2638><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> the saints <S%G40><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is the breadth <S%G4114><s%> and length <S%G3372><s%> and height <S%G5311><s%> and depth, <S%G899><s%>

and to know <S%G1097><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> which surpasses <S%G5235><s%> knowledge, <S%G1108><s%> that you may be filled <S%G4137><s%> up to all <S%G3956><s%> the fulness <S%G4138><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> to Him who is able <S%G1410><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> exceeding <S%G5238><s%> abundantly <S%G5238><s%> beyond <S%G5228><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that we ask <S%G154><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> think, <S%G3539><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the power <S%G1411><s%> that works <S%G1754><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> us,

to Him [be] the glory <S%G1391><s%> in the church <S%G1577><s%> and in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> generations <S%G1074><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
